attributes.action: Say no to any more refugees
attributes.background: Our country is full. Our war veterans are sleeping rough. Our schools are full. The nhs is at breaking point. We do not want any more asylum seekers or refugees wherever they are from

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
